title: Black life is a matter.
subtitle: Rumours: The picture shows that two people hang a sign reading "#BlackLifesMatter: But only when they are killed by the police. Killed by each other? Not much.
author: David Mikkelson
vclaim: The picture shows that two people hang a sign that says: "#BlackLifesMatter: But only when they are killed by the police. Killed by each other? "Not so much."
